DOC.brief_summary: The purpose this research is to check if Brazil Nuts consumed improvement the metabolic profile, state redox and endothelial function in obese adolescents.
DOC.brief_title: Brazil Nut Consumed on the Metabolic Profile, Oxidative Stress and Nutritive Microcirculatory Patterns
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose this research is to check if Brazil Nuts consumed improvement the metabolic profile (lipid profile, glucose, insulin), state redox (about glutathione peroxidase, isoprostane and LDL-ox) and endothelial function (by videocapillaroscopy) in obese adolescents (12-18 years).
DOC.criteria: pubertal girls obese (BMI > 30 kg/m) Consumption of nuts Loss weight before the research chronic disease (hypertension)
